title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1806.13 - Submission of application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1806.13 - Submission of application

State Regulations

Sponsors of projects subject to review and approval of the
commission under section
1806.4, 1806.5 or
1806.6
of this Part, or project
sponsors seeking renewal of an existing approval of the commission, shall
submit an application and applicable fee to the commission, in accordance with
this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1806.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
